title: 服务器正版验证问题，求解~
author: Y_SHENG_
txt_content: 已经关掉正版验证，但是一运行bat文件会自动改回开起正版验证{:10_527:}

replies.author: Innovators
replies.txt_content: 配置问题,发出配置文件,应该有错误自动重置了

replies.author: Koke_Cacao
replies.txt_content:
你把server.pxxxxx的文件发过来看看
我估计是你配置文件有问题

replies.author: Y_SHENG_
replies.txt_content:
#Minecraft server properties
#Tue Jan 19 10:50:40 CST 2016
generator-settings=
op-permission-level=4
allow-nether=true
level-name=world
enable-query=false
allow-flight=false
announce-player-achievements=true

force-gamemode=false

spawn-npcs=true

spawn-animals=true
snooper-enabled=true
hardcore=false
online-mode=true
resource-pack=
pvp=true

server-name=Unknown Server
enable-command-block=true
player-idle-timeout=0
gamemode=0

spawn-monsters=true

generate-structures=true
spawn-protection=16
motd=A Minecraft Server

replies.author: HeartCity
replies.txt_content:
Y_SHENG_ 发表于 2016-1-19 19:27
#Minecraft server properties
#Tue Jan 19 10:50:40 CST 2016
generator-settings=
online-mode=true
改成false

replies.author: Y_SHENG_
replies.txt_content:
HeartCity 发表于 2016-1-19 19:52
online-mode=true
改成false
我的问题是改了之后运行bat文件又会改回来
